channel.title: Okay... I Need SOOOO Much help
channel.description:
Okay. I know I posted a bunch of things like "Testscape won't save what I change for my char?" and a few others. I need a lot of help. Here is 1 thing I need to let you know.....
1. I READ MOD TAHAROK'S ULTIMATE SERVER GUIDE!!!
I did not understand 1 bit of it.
Here are my questions
1. Is there anything else I need to download? (I'll list what I got later) 2. How come what I change what I put in my client.java and save it nothing happens to my Testscape? 3.I downloaded a source, now how do I get it to be mine?
Okay. Those are my questions. And what I have is a Testscape source. When I log onto it, it says who the mods and admins are... I also have the I.P. [5.110.89.232] (which i got from my hamachi =]) and other people can log into into it. But I can't give any people admin/modship.
Here are some things I know how to do... 1. I know how to open up client.java and all the other stuff. 2.I know how to open/extract files and find my stuff
Here are things I don't know how to do... 1. Enter my own codes
What I did: I went to client.java and found the messages that pop up at the bottom of the screen. I changed "Welcome to Testscape!" to "Welcome to Linscape!" and nothing changed (Even after i saved). I also changed the admins to my name from "admin" to "Lin" and still... nothing happened... (And these were the messages that appeared at the bottom when you logged in) I also changed my player rights (Under the character folder) from 0-3... Like character-rights = 0 to... character-rights = 3... NOTHING CHANGED!!! SO WILL SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME!!!
Thank you Sooo much... And if you tell me how to change the rights I'll make you ADMIN!!! (Don't tell me to find where it says rights and change from 0-3... I already know that... Well, you can but I don't know how to keep it saved)(Clicking on File and clicking on save/saveas won't work)
With great thanks, Lin. (Whew, done typing)

item.title: Okay... I Need SOOOO Much help
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

OMG THANK YOU!!! I BET THAT IS IT!!![br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 06:42:45 PM[/size][hr]I downloaded Phonescape… Is it good?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2007, 07:07:37 PM[/size][hr]Okay. I didnt download the source… lol

Read full topic
item.source: Okay... I Need SOOOO Much help

item.title: Okay... I Need SOOOO Much help
item.dc:creator: @SFate SFate
item.description:
@SFate wrote:

Aight, honestly, I didn’t bother to read past the 6th line. But I can post that there are some “unedited” testscapes out there that are obfuscated, and you can’t change them. You might just want to go with a different source.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay... I Need SOOOO Much help

item.title: Okay... I Need SOOOO Much help
item.dc:creator: @King_Dawgs King_Dawgs
item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

The source is where you put the copy and paste. If you dont know what i mean whats source do you have. pm and ill help you out but your source is where you enter

Read full topic

item.title: Okay... I Need SOOOO Much help
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. I know I posted a bunch of things like “Testscape won’t save what I change for my char?” and a few others. I need a lot of help. Here is 1 thing I need to let you know…

  1. I READ MOD TAHAROK’S ULTIMATE SERVER GUIDE!!!

I did not understand 1 bit of it.

Here are my questions

  1. Is there anything else I need to download? (I’ll list what I got later)
  2. How come what I change what I put in my client.java and save it nothing happens to my Testscape?
    3.I downloaded a source, now how do I get it to be mine?

Okay. Those are my questions. And what I have is a Testscape source. When I log onto it, it says who the mods and admins are… I also have the I.P. [5.110.89.232] (which i got from my hamachi =]) and other people can log into into it. But I can’t give any people admin/modship.

Here are some things I know how to do…

  1. I know how to open up client.java and all the other stuff.
    2.I know how to open/extract files and find my stuff

Here are things I don’t know how to do…

  1. Enter my own codes

What I did:
I went to client.java and found the messages that pop up at the bottom of the screen. I changed “Welcome to Testscape!” to “Welcome to Linscape!” and nothing changed (Even after i saved). I also changed the admins to my name from “admin” to “Lin” and still… nothing happened… (And these were the messages that appeared at the bottom when you logged in) I also changed my player rights (Under the character folder) from 0-3… Like character-rights = 0 to… character-rights = 3…
NOTHING CHANGED!!! SO WILL SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME!!!

Thank you Sooo much… And if you tell me how to change the rights I’ll make you ADMIN!!! (Don’t tell me to find where it says rights and change from 0-3… I already know that… Well, you can but I don’t know how to keep it saved)(Clicking on File and clicking on save/saveas won’t work)

With great thanks, Lin. (Whew, done typing)
